description_html:
CRÈME / Jun Aizaki Architecture & Design introduces six new designs to its Exchange Collection with Stellar Works.

Following the success of the Exchange Chair, CRÈME expands the collection with a full range featuring dining tables, bar stools, dining chairs and lounge chair. The Exchange Collection is a contemporary reinterpretation of the renowned Windsor form. By “exchanging” the traditional wooden spindles and stretcher of the Windsor with steel, CRÈME has produced a collection that feels both contemporary and traditional at once. The collection is available in a wide range of metal and wood finishes.
